short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An unoffical timer extension for Toastmasters speeches

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you an active member of Toastmasters or a similar public speaking club? Enhance your meetings with our intuitive and beautifully designed Chrome extension, specially crafted for Toastmasters by a fellow member!

Features:

-Beautiful and Simple UI: Enjoy a clean, easy-to-use interface that makes managing your timing responsibilities a breeze.
-Toastmasters Standard Timer: Automatically applies the standard green, yellow, and red color coding for speech timing, ensuring consistency with Toastmasters guidelines.
-Custom Timer Options: Need flexibility? Set your own custom timers to suit any speech or presentation format.
-Predefined Speech Timers: Quickly select from preset timers for common Toastmasters segments like Ice Breaker, Prepared Speech, Extended Speech, Table Topics, and Evaluations.
-Effortless Timer Role Management: Keep track of all speeches during a meeting with time logs, color-coded speech timings, and a comprehensive report at the end.
-Club Name Customization: Personalize the extension by adding your club's name.
-Export Meeting Logs: Easily export the meeting log as an image, perfect for record-keeping or sharing with your club members.

Disclaimer:
This extension is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected to Toastmasters International. As a fellow Toastmaster, I developed this tool for my personal use and decided to share it freely for anyone who might find it helpful. Enjoy and happy speaking!
